obfuscated

Interface PlayerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ModListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mod
    Deprecated. 
    for some reason this interface is obfuscated, you won't find it under this name.

    public interface PlayerListener
extends ModListener
    If registered correctly in Mod, the method of this interface will be called, when an associated event occurs.

      • onPlayerChangedContol

        void onPlayerChangedContol(org.schema.game.common.data.player.PlayerState player,
                         obfuscated.eM em,
                         org.schema.common.util.linAlg.Vector3i blockLocation,
                         org.schema.schine.network.objects.Sendable sendable,
                         org.schema.common.util.linAlg.Vector3i blockLocation2)
        Deprecated. 
        Called whenever the player enters/exists a block. Can be both events at one time
        Parameters:
        player - the player, who entered/exited a block
        blockLocation - the location of a block, currently unknown if entered or exited block
        sendable - the sendable containing the entered/exited block
        blockLocation2 - the location of a block, currently unknown if entered or exited block
